leitej.xml.om

Class XmlomOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • leitej.xml.om.XmlomOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class XmlomOutputStream
extends java.io.OutputStream
    XML Object Modelling Output Stream

    The stream do not allow send two references from the same object without flush the stream.
    Author:
    Julio Leite
    See Also:
    XmlomInputStream

      • XmlomOutputStream

        public XmlomOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream out,
                         java.lang.String charsetName,
                         boolean minified)
                  throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Creates a new instance of XmlomOutputStream.
        Parameters:
        out - an OutputStream
        charsetName - the name of a supported charset
        minified - when false produces a human readable XML, other wise outputs a clean strait line
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - If the named encoding is not supported
